attributes.action: an independent organisation free of gvt required to investigate police and rspca
attributes.additional_details: evidence exists rspca inspectors furnishlies to dcs for a warrants and this dcs breaching paced codes for a warrant that was unfounded. legally all that stemmed from that warrant is illegal.there is no independent organisation to investigate police nor rspca crimes of obtaining an illegal warrants. its not acceptable for a police psd to investigate police crime its out of jurisdiction there is no one to investigate rspca we got lots of dead missing traumatised people stemming from state crime
attributes.background: the police and the rspca are partners in crimes upon people and animals the rspca put lies upon the police to obtain warrants to conduct victorian era style raids in peoples homes leading to people and animal deaths police are blindly accepting rspca lies and fetching warrants catering to crime

rejection.details: If you would like the Government or Parliament to open an inquiry into the activities of the RSPCA, you could start a petition about that.
